titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of the revised edition of the pamphlet entitled "The Constitution of the United States of America".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Procurement and Printing.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
House Committee on House Administration Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably. With a reservation.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 276.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/30/1987--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Authorizes the printing of a revised edition of "The Constitution of the United States of America" as a House document.
